text: Caio Narcio Rodrigues da Silveira (21 August 1986 – 16 August 2020) often simply known as Caio Narcio was a Brazilian politician and a social scientist. He was born in Uberlândia, Minas Gerais. He was a Federal Deputy from 2015 to 2019. In 2018, Narcio was diagnosed with meningoencephalitis. In July 2020, he was hospitalized in São Paulo with COVID-19. He died from the infection and meningoencephalitis on 16 August 2020, less than a week before his 34th birthday. ==References== Category:1986 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in São Paulo Category:Politicians from Minas Gerais Category:Deaths from brain disease
title: Caio Narcio
